https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hy7dbF4YXX5fMbxisAbQpwwknwa.jpg Lolle's love life in Berlin is as complicated as ever. After the story with Sven, her second cousin, was over, she got together with her best friend Hart and the two are about to get married. That is, if Sven doesn't ruin things. Berlin, Berlin
